body:
Hi,


as I'm using git to work on the Debian package of radiance now, i
thought about pulling the CVS HEAD into git every night, so I can share
it (and use it for my packaging work, of course). If anybody else would
be interested in git access, I'd setup the repository, if not, I'll just
pull the patch when I need it.
(As I don't have direct access to the CVS I'd just pull the patch every
night and apply it, being able to use git-cvs would be better, of course).


Cheers,


Bernd


P.S. Radiance 3R9 will be shipped with Debian Lenny, I'm almost done
with it and the upload should happen this weekend.




 Bernd Zeimetz                           Debian GNU/Linux Developer
 GPG Fingerprint: 06C8 C9A2 EAAD E37E 5B2C BE93 067A AD04 C93B FF79
___
